extension.news: [COLOR lavender][B]Manage Kodi Favourites[/B][/COLOR] [B]2.0:[/B] - Inital Public release - Add ability to add Prefixes, Suffixes and Colors.
extension.description:
Lets you manage the entries in your [B]Favourites[/B] by either adding "prefix/suffix" or "coloring".
Select item and madify depending on selected items
Modify picklists in the configuration screen.
Use this to quickly and easily manage your Favourites.
